commentBody: We left" fun" behind a long time ago  in the age of "no backsies" and "not it"---Replay is  another vain attempt to control the uncontrollable- we do best when we accept our humanity, flaws and all.. A game is best enjoyed in full continuity- to do otherwise is a waste of time itself. Nobody pays to see umpires umpire and the same holds for microphotography  and data.
